name: mirror-git-repository-vsts-task
description: A straightforward utility to mirror one Git repository to another location
author: Swellaby

inputs.name: sourceGitRepositoryUri
inputs.label: Source Git Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The URL of a Git repository to be used as the mirror's source. The default value of '$(Build.Repository.Uri)' will use the VSTS repository connected to this build.

Example: https://github.com/traviskosarek/traviskosarek-com.git

inputs.name: sourceGitRepositoryPersonalAccessToken
inputs.label: Source Repository - Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Personal Access Token that grants read access to the Git repository used as the Source Git Repository

inputs.name: destinationGitRepositoryUri
inputs.label: Destination Git Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The URL of a Git repository to be used as the mirror's destination.

Example: https://github.com/traviskosarek/traviskosarek-com.git

inputs.name: destinationGitRepositoryPersonalAccessToken
inputs.label: Destination Repository - Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Personal Access Token that grants write access to the Git repository used as the Destination Git Repository
